import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import {Link, Redirect} from "react-router-dom" import {connect} from"react-redux" import logo from "../../assets/images/logos/logo-complet.png" import menuIcon from "../../assets/icons/menu-icon.svg" import adminIcon from "../../assets/icons/admin-icon.svg" import profileIcon from "../../assets/icons/profile-icon.svg" import cartIcon from "../../assets/icons/cart-icon.svg" import searchIcon from "../../assets/icons/search-icon.svg" import RegisterPopUp from "../../components/registerPopUp" import { Button } from '@material-ui/core'; const Header = (props) => { const [openRegisterPopUp, setOpenRegisterPopUp] = useState(false); const [redirect, setRedirect] = useState(false) const registerForm = () => { setOpenRegisterPopUp(false) setRedirect(true) } const closeRegisterForm = () => { setOpenRegisterPopUp(false) } return (
{/*
*/}
{openRegisterPopUp && { registerForm()}} opened={openRegisterPopUp} closeRegisterForm={(e) => {c}}/>}
{redirect && }
) } export default Header
